Home

Monogatari

JavaScript game engine

This project aims to facilitate game programming for browsers. Currently supports 2D games and it's composed by the libraries three.js, box2d.js and howler.js.

Check a simple example here or read the documentation.

License

MIT

JSDoc 3.5.4
